LanguageData.AnimalInsanitySingle: A local {0} has gone mad. It will attack everyone it sees.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanityMultiple: Some sort of psychic wave has swept over the landscape. Your colonists are okay, but...\n\nIt seems many of the {0}s in the area have been driven insane.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidLeaderPresent: One of the {0} - {1}, is the leader of the faction.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidLeaderPresent: One of the {0} - {1}, is the leader of the faction.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash:
You've detected an escape pod crashing hard nearby.

If anyone survived the impact, they'll be badly wounded.

You can rescue them and send them on their way. Or, capture them for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.CargoPodCrash: You have detected a cluster of cargo pods crashing nearby.\n\nPerhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuit: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged in an electrical explosion.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasLarge: This large amount of power has created an explosion of considerable size.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasHuge: That really is a huge explosion. Wow.
LanguageData.TraderArrival: A trade ship is passing nearby.\n\nThey are known as {0}. They are a {1}.
LanguageData.SingleTravelerPassing: A {0} from {1} is passing by. [PAWN_pronoun] is named {2}.
LanguageData.GroupTravelersPassing: A group of travelers from {0} are passing by.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrives: A {0} from {1} is visiting the colony.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] is named {2}.{3}{4}
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrivesTraderInfo: \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] seems to have a few items to trade.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrivesLeaderInfo: \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] is the leader of the faction.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArrive: A group from {0} are visiting the colony.{1}{2}
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArriveTraderInfo: \n\nThey seem to have a few items to trade.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArriveLeaderInfo: \n\nOne of the visitors - {0}, is the leader of the faction.
LanguageData.ManhunterPackArrived:
A pack of man-hunting {0}s have entered the area. They will roam the region, hunting for humanoid flesh.

They can't pass doors, so if you stay behind walls you should be safe. They won't attack inactive turrets, so turn your turrets off if you want to save them.

They'll leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalInsanityPulse: The ancient structure has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven nearby animals mad.
LanguageData.LetterShipPartDroveColonistInsane: The crashed ship part has emitted a focused psychic pulse that has driven colonist {0} insane.
LanguageData.LetterPsychicDroneLevelIncreased: The crashed ship part is now emanating a more powerful kind of psychic drone. Every humanlike in the area now feels more disturbed, terrified, and paranoid.
LanguageData.LetterAgentRevealed: {0} has been revealed as an agent of your enemy {1}.\n\nThey are attempting to escape now.
LanguageData.LetterIncidentPsychicDrone: Every colonist of the {0} gender winces in pain!\n\nSome distant engine of hatred is stirring. It is projecting a powerful psychic drone over this entire region, on a frequency that only seems to affect the {0} gender. For a few days, some people's mood will be quite a bit worse.
LanguageData.LetterIncidentPsychicSoothe: Every colonist of the {0} gender smiles with contentment!\n\nSome distant engine of happiness is stirring. It is projecting a powerful psychic drone over this entire region, on a frequency that only seems to affect the {0} gender. For a few days, some people's mood will be quite a bit better.
LanguageData.BeaversArrived: A group of hungry alphabeavers has just arrived.\n\nTry to eliminate them before they decimate every last tree in the region.
LanguageData.RefugeeChasedInitial:
A {1} named {0} calls you from nearby. [PAWN_pronoun] is being chased by {2} from {3}!

[PAWN_pronoun] begs for safety and offers to join your colony. Biologically, [PAWN_pronoun] is {4} years old.

Be warned - if you accept, you'll have to fight off the {2} on [PAWN_possessive] tail.
LanguageData.RefugeeChasedRejected: {0} screams in panic through the tinny speaker before you cut off the transmission.
LanguageData.LetterAnimalSelfTameAndNameNumerical: {0} has become tame. It is now designated {1}.
LanguageData.LetterAnimalSelfTameAndName: {0} has become tame. Colonists have decided to name it {1}.
LanguageData.LetterFarmAnimalsWanderIn: A group of {0}s, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem accustomed to human contact and are joining the colony.
LanguageData.LetterThrumboPasses:
A small herd of thrumbos have wandered into the area.

Peaceful by nature, these rare creatures are extremely dangerous when confronted. Some traders are willing to pay a lot of money for their precious leather and horn.

Thrumbos will leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.LetterTraderCaravanArrival: A caravan from {0} is approaching. They are a {1}.\n\nThey will hang around the colony for a few days before leaving. You can attack them - but this will anger their faction!
LanguageData.RansomDemand: {1} contacts you on radio. They are holding former colonist {0} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release [PAWN_objective] back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
LanguageData.JourneyOffer:
A friendly AI from your past named Charlon Whitestone has sent you a message!

He reveals that he has a starship hidden on this planet, and sends you its world coordinates.

If you travel to the ship, Charlon will take you off this rim world, to the stars.
LanguageData.CaravanMeeting: Your caravan has met peacefully with a caravan from {0}. The other caravan is composed of:\n\n{1}
LanguageData.CaravanDemand: Your caravan has been ambushed by a group of {1} {3} from {0}. They will attack unless you give them:\n\n{2}
LanguageData.CropBlight: A mysterious blight has ravaged your crops.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidWalkIn: A group of {0} from {1} have arrived nearby.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidEdgeDrop: A group of {0} from {1} have arrived in drop pods nearby.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidCenterDrop: A group of {0} from {1} have dropped in right on top of you!
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidWalkIn: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have arrived nearby.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidEdgeDrop: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have dropped in from orbit nearby.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidCenterDrop: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have dropped from orbit right on top of you!
LanguageData.WandererJoin: A {0} named [PAWN_nameDef] has arrived and is joining the colony. [PAWN_pronoun] is a {1}.
LanguageData.LetterBuildingBrokenDown: One of your machines ({0}) has broken down. It won't work until a colonist with the Construction work type goes and fixes it.
LanguageData.ItemStashQuestFeeDemand: {0} is willing to tell us the location of the stash in exchange for {1} silver.
LanguageData.ItemStashSitePart_Unknown: Unfortunately, {0} has no idea who or what - if anything - might be guarding the stash.
LanguageData.ItemStashSitePart_Nothing: {0} says that the stash is unguarded.
LanguageData.ItemStashSitePart_Outpost: {0} says that there is an enemy outpost nearby.
LanguageData.ItemStashSitePart_Turrets: {0} says that the stash is surrounded by enemy turrets.
LanguageData.ItemStashSitePart_Manhunters: {0} says that there is a group of manhunting animals wandering nearby.
